    All functions

    Calculcate uptake

    Creates deuterium uptake replicate dataset

    Creates dataset with merged hires parameters for two states.

    Creates dataset with uc distances

    Provides a peptide list
    get_uc_distance()
    Calculates the uc distance for uptake curve
    hradexify()
    HRaDeX customized ggplot theme
    omit_amino()
    Omit first amino of peptides
    plot_3d_structure_blank()
    Plots blank 3D structure
    plot_3d_structure_hires()
    Presents classification results on 3D structure
    plot_class_heatmap()
    Plots heatmap with classification parameters
    plot_color_distance()
    Plots assigned color distance
    plot_cov_class()
    Plots coverage with classification results
    plot_double_uc()
    Plots two uc plots side by side
    plot_estimated_k()
    Plots estimated k
    plot_fitted_uc()
    Plots uptake curve with fit components
    plot_hires()
    Plots high resolution classification plot
    plot_interactive()
    Wrapper for interactivity
    plot_k_distance()
    Plots estimated k distance
    plot_lm()
    Plots uc with linear fit
    plot_n()
    Plots n values
    plot_params_map()
    Plots map of params
    plot_rss_hist()
    Histogram of fit rss values
    plot_singular_uc()
    Plots singular uptake curve
    plot_start_params()
    Plots initial fit parameters
    plot_two_states()
    Plots the classification results for two states
    plot_uc()
    Plots uc and fit parameters for peptide in two states.
    plot_uc_distance()
    Plots the uc difference type 2
    plot_uc_real_dist()
    Plots the uc difference type 1
    prepare_diff_data()
    Prepares differential data
    prepare_kin_dat()
